org.jerkar.api.depmanagement
Class JkScope

java.lang.Object
  org.jerkar.api.depmanagement.JkScope
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
JkScope.JkOptionableScope
public class JkScope
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

Defines a context where is defined dependencies of a given project. According we need to compile, test or run the application, the dependencies may diverge. For example, Junit library may only be necessary for testing, so we can declare that Junit is only necessary for scope TEST.
Similar to Maven scope or Ivy configuration.

See Also:
Serialized Form
